description:
Here at the law firm of Sprott, Golden & Bardwell in Harrison, Arkansas we are fully prepared to assist you with virtually any legal challenge affecting your life, your family, your business and your future. Serving clients throughout Boone County and the surrounding areas, our team of dedicated, seasoned attorneys provides exceptional representation and support to clients who have legal needs involving any of the following practice areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Family law and divorce
  • Criminal defense
  • Estate planning and probate
  • Real estate law
  • Corporate law
  • Contracts
  • Municipal law
  • Creditors' rights
  • General civil litigation

With two additional law offices in Berryville and Clinton, we have become one of western Arkansas leading full-service legal practices by delivering unmatched, personalized counsel to those we serve. As further evidence of our success, we have earned a 10 Best in Client Satisfaction Award from the American Institute of Legal Counsel for Estate Planning, and we have received numerous positive testimonials and referrals from our clients along with many accolades from our peers.

No matter how complex your situation, you can rely on us to work closely with you to fully address your needs and to increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you expect and deserve. We are extremely confident in our ability to help you with your legal matter, and we hope that you will return to us time and again for help and support with any other legal issue you may face.

To find out more about how Sprott, Golden & Bardwell can best serve you and help you secure a brighter, safer and more financially stable future for yourself, your family or your company, you can call our office or visit our law firm's website to schedule a free initial consultation.
